name: Add ♪'s to Beginning and End of Each Line
long_description: Add a music note to the front and back of each line

name: Remove Periods To Look Like Song Lyrics
long_description: Strip out periods, question marks, and commas. May help the text look more like a song lyrics.

name: Save Dialogues in Quotation Marks
long_description: Temporarily replace dialogues in quotation marks with unique placeholders

name: Save Dialogues with Dashes
long_description: Temporarily replace dialogues with dashes with unique placeholders

name: Remove Non-dialogue Lines
long_description: Remove all lines that don't start with dialog placeholders

name: Restore Dialogues from Quotation Marks Placeholders
long_description: Restore dialogues from quotation marks placeholders

name: Remove Extra Blank Lines
long_description: Replace multiple consecutive newline characters with a single newline
